text: Take bala hala, e'i prasade prabesa kara. Yakhana se tara prati drstipata karala se dharana karala ye, eta sbaccha gabhira jalasaya. Se tara payera gocha khule phelala. Sulayamana balala, eta to sbaccha sphatika nirmita prasada. Bilakisa balala, he amara palanakarta, ami to nijera prati juluma karechi. Ami sulayamanera sathe bisba jahanera palanakarta allahara kache atnasamarpana karalama.
